contents: 1. fol. 1b-4b: Risālah fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-Shakāzīyah.
2. fol. 4b-5b: Risālah fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-Shakāzīyah.
3. fol. 5b-9a: Risālah al-fatḥīyah fī al-aʻmāl al-jaybīyah.
4. fol. 9b-15b: Risālah fī asmāʼ al-rusūm al-marsūmah ʻalá al-ālah al-musammāt bi-al-asṭurlāb al-shamālī dhāt al-ṣafāʼiḥ.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
